thread.title: Sam Armytage takes a reality check
thread.title_full: Sam Armytage takes a reality check

title: Sam Armytage takes a reality check
text:
Sam Armytage talks Botox, dating, paparazzi and that vicious rumour campaign by ‘the sisterhood’ By Siobhan Duck and Colin Vickery News Corp Australia Network Sam Armytage talks Botox, dating, paparazzi and that vicious rumour campaign by ‘the sisterhood’ By Siobhan Duck and Colin Vickery News Corp Australia Network Kochie slams Sam Armytage after she admits to staying in because of a bad hair day 0:14 
Sunrise host Samantha Armytage admits she didn't go out on Friday night because she had a bad hair day and nothing to wear. Kochie slams her. Courtesy Sunrise/Channel Seven. July 21st 2015 3 months ago 
AS Samatha Armytage heads towards 40, she is flirting with the idea of a bit of Botox. 
But something, or rather someone, has held the 38-year-old blonde Sunrise presenter back from having a stab at the jab. 
“My mother would kill me,” she laughs. 
It’s clear that Armytage still values her mother Libby’s opinion — on screen and off. She regularly gets texts from both her mother and father (Mac) during the show, offering their views on the guests, her interviews and even her hair.
